pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Hypotheses Testing for Multiple Families/Groups Structure // A Comprehensive tool for almost all existing multiple testing methods for multiple families. The package summarizes the existing methods for multiple families multiple testing procedures (MTPs) such as double FDR, group Benjamini- Hochberg (GBH) procedure and average FDR controlling procedure. The package also provides some novel multiple testing procedures using selective inference idea.
